gamerule.expPower.description: How much the EXP Curve increase every Level Up
gamerule.maxLVL.description: -1 and below for infinite levels, 0 and 1 to disable lvl up, 2 and above to set max level
gamerule.expBase.description: Amount of EXP to get from LVL 1 to 2
gamerule.sPPerLVL.description: Amount of skill points per level
